Name: TRIGGERED
About the game: Locked inside a mental hospital, your mission is to simply, escape. This game is very difficult, you get 1 life, 1 hp, limited time & limited ammo, when you die, you start from the beginning. Different kind of enemies, ranged and melee. Bosses Limited ammo Limited time No checkpoints, you die, you reset. 3 Difficulty levels Multiplayer support, play with a friend (2 player coop) Time & Score Leaderboards
